Pre-Game Insights: Ghanaians are in high spirits concerning the upcoming AFCON tournament.
Ghana’s squad selection by her football coach Mr. Chris Hughton has aroused a level of positivity and this match would be the manifestation of Ghana’s readiness for the AFCON.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both teams have each won a game against each other with 0 draws recorded.
Starting time for the Baba Yara Sports Stadium game is 8pm.
The public is hereby notified by organizers that the Centre Line and Popular stands are free of charge.
